name: Whiteblind
r1: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (24% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.
r2: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 7.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (30% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.
r3: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 9% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (36% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.
r4: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 10.5% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (42% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.
r5: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (48% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.
